title: Climbing Hold Mug
description: A secret santa gift for someone who loves climbing.

images.description: Started with a cheap mug, one swift bash on the workbench knocked the handle off.
Shaped the hold to the curve of the mug by wrapping the mug in 80 grit sandpaper and sanding the hold down on it.
Made some holes to accomodate the stubs of the handle on the drill press.
Attached the hold to the mug with epoxy, clamped and left to dry overnight.
